events.message: I received my order last week, but the product is not what I expected, and I want to initiate a refund immediately.
The case has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request to ensure proper assistance.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your order. How can I help you today?
Could you please provide the order number and details about why you want to return the product so we can process your refund?
The order number is 987654321. The item did not match the description and arrived with missing parts, so I need a full refund.
We will start the refund process right away. Please return the product using the prepaid shipping label we will send to your email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and for providing a prepaid shipping label. I appreciate your help in resolving this refund quickly.
The refund has been processed and should appear in your account within 5-7 business days. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for reaching out to our support team, and have a great day!
